snippet.title: Solar Conqueror - (1983) - Bally Astrocade - gameplay
snippet.description:
Bally Midway © 1983
[Console] Bally Astrocade
Emulator: MAME 0.226

This is a good one!  Arena shooter where you have freedom of movement, your ship has some physics for flying around, and shoots whichever direction it's facing.  You go LIGHT SPEED to a star system, attempt to shoot everything in site… and that will advance you to the next star system.  Very cool.  Good rate of difficulty ramp up, I think system 5 was rather hard, but easily got through systems 1-3.  One of the best on Bally Arcade.
